name: Air Hockey Defense
description:
AIR HOCKEY DEFENSE

A game created for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam with the theme 'Only One'.

INPUT

(Joystick recommended)

-Movement: Arrow keys or Analog stick

-LEFT SHIFT or Joystick button: Boost

INSTRUCTIONS

Think it as a tower defense game.

Hit all enemies with the ball and don't let anyone stand inside your area for more than one second. This rule applies for you too.
